presentation.title: Yesezani kuyankhulana kwanu kotsatira!
presentation.message:
Kodi kutenga zokambirana za ntchito kumakusangalatsani komanso kuda nkhawa?
Mwinanso mukumva kuti simukufuna kufunsa mafunso?
Ili ndiye pulogalamu yabwino yoyeserera luso lanu loyankhulana pantchito yofunsidwa!

presentation.title: Konzekerani ntchito yanu yotsatira!
presentation.message: Anzeru a Jobdevaview amagwiritsa ntchito mphamvu ya nzeru zowunikira kuti akuthandizeni kudziwa luso lazokambirana zofunikira pa moyo weniweniwo.

presentation.title: Kulembetsa Premium:
presentation.message: Landirani lipoti kumapeto kwa zofunsidwa lililonse zikulamba zokambiranazo ndi malingaliro ndi upangiri wa momwe mungapangire kuyankhulana kwa ntchito yeniyeni.

list.title: Chotsani mbiriyakale?
list.message: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa mbiri yonse?

entry.title: Chotsani Mafunso?
entry.message: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa kuyankhulana kumeneku?

validation.title: Cholakwika chovomerezeka
validation.invalid_fields:
Ikani udindo woyenera kugwira ntchito yofunsira mafunso atsopano.
Mwina

color_scheme.name: Mutu wakuda
color_scheme.description:
Sankhani pakati pa mutu wowala komanso wakuda.
Ingoyikani pamutu wa chipangizocho nthawi yoyamba yomwe mumatsegula pulogalamuyi.

language.name: Chinenero
language.description: Sankhani chilankhulo chowoneka bwino kuti muwonetse mukamagwiritsa ntchito pulogalamuyi ndikulankhula ndi ai poyankhulana.

cooldown.description:
Mtundu waulere wa pulogalamuyi umakupatsani mwayi wofunsira kamodzi pa ola limodzi.

Ngati mungafune kuchotsa malire, chotsani zotsatsa, ndikulandila lipoti la mayankho ndi upangiri wa momwe mungasinthire atangoyankhulana chilichonse, lingalirani kulembetsa ku Prectium.
cooldown.active:
Yembekezerani nthawi yanthawi yopanga isanayambike kuyankhulana kumene.

Ngati mukufuna kuchotsa zitsulo, chotsani zotsatsa, ndikulandila lipoti la mayankho ndi upangiri wa momwe mungasinthire atangoyankhulana chilichonse, lingalirani kulembetsa ku premium.

review.request:
Ngati mukufuna pulogalamuyi, chonde lingalirani kusiya ndemanga yotithandiza.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

new_interview.title: Mafunso atsopano alipo!
new_interview.message: Muli ndi kuyankhulana kwatsopano komwe kumapezeka kuti mugwire ntchito yantchito.

subscription.title: Ndalama
subscription.thanks: Zikomo kwambiri chifukwa cholembetsa ku Premium! Tikukufunirani zabwino zonse ndi kuchita bwino pa zoyankhula zanu zamtsogolo!

error.subscription_options:
Takanika kukweza mapulani olembetsa.

Chonde, onani intaneti yanu, kapena yesaninso pambuyo pake.

error.title: Kulakwa
error.connection_fix: Onani kulumikizana kwanu pa intaneti ndikuyesanso pambuyo pake.

store.short_description: Yesezani kuyankhulana kwanu kotsatira ndi iyi
store.full_description:
Kodi kutenga zokambirana za ntchito kumakusangalatsani komanso kuda nkhawa?
Mwinanso mukumva kuti simukufuna kufunsa mafunso?
Ili ndiye pulogalamu yabwino yoyeserera luso lanu loyankhulana pantchito yofunsidwa!

Anzeru a Jobdevaview amagwiritsa ntchito mphamvu ya nzeru zakuthupi kuti azitha kuyankhulana ntchito zomwe zikuthandizani kuti mukhale ndi malingaliro abwino pa moyo weniweniwo.

Zoyankhulana zimagwirizana ndi ntchito yomwe mukufuna, ndipo idzapangidwa ndikusinthidwa ndikusinthidwa ndi mafunso okhudzana ndi zolinga zanu kuti muimirenso kuyankhulana.

Ogwiritsa ntchito premium adzalandiranso lipoti kumapeto kwa mafunso aliwonse akuliza kuyankhulana ndi malingaliro ndi upangiri wamomwe mungapangire kuyankhulana kwa ntchito.
taglines: ACE ACE LAKO LABWINO LABWINO NDI AI!
premium_benefits: Landirani malipoti ndi ndemanga ndi upangiri
Mafunso Opanda malire Opanda Ma Cooldns
Landirani malipoti ndi ndemanga ndi upangiri pambuyo pa zokambirana

translation.title: Thandizani Kutanthauzira
translation.description: Thandizo limatanthauzira izi ku zilankhulo zina.
